about.subtitle: Where AI Meets Animation
about.title: ABOUT THE CHALLENGE
about.description1: Welcome to AniGen, the world's first vertical short AI animation competition hosted by KomikoAI, Hedra, Hailuo, and AniShort. We're bringing together cutting-edge AI technology and creative storytelling to pioneer a new genre of animation.
about.description2: AniGen aims to discover and promote emerging creators in the field of animation. You are invited to push the boundaries of what's possible in animation with AI. Whether you're an AI creator, a traditional animator exploring new technology, a scriptwriter, or an animation enthusiast â€” this is your chance to showcase your talent and win exceptional prizes, free AI tool subscriptions, and even opportunities to publish your shows on the AniShort streaming app.

animation.title: ANIMATION TRACK
animation.description: Create a vertical short animation that tells a compelling story

content.label: Content:
content.value: The animation should tell a full story or should be the opening story of a longer series. We do NOT accept trailers or music videos.

requirements.label: Key Requirements:
list: Use AI tools for at least 50% of creation, including:
At least one character talking scene using Hedra's Character-3 model
At least one character/scene image generated with KomikoAI
At least one animation clip generated with Hailuo, either through Hailuo platform or through Hedra/KomikoAI
Original work only - no copyright infringement
Post your work on Twitter/X and tag #AniGen @hedra_labs @KomikoAI @Hailuo_AI @AniShortApp so official accounts can repost
You must be 18 or older to qualify
No NSFW content, hate speech, extreme violence, or copyrighted material

scriptwriting.title: SCRIPTWRITING TRACK
scriptwriting.description: Craft an original concept for a vertical short animation series

format.label: Format:
format.value: Concept package with scripts for the first 5 episodes

duration.label: Duration:
duration.value: Each episode should be 1-2 minutes, designed for fast-paced, attention-grabbing storytelling

genre.label: Genre:
genre.value: All genres are welcome, e.g., action, romance, fantasy, isekai, shounen, etc.

requirements.label: Requirements:
list: Title, plot synopsis, character overview, and complete scripts of the first 5 episodes
Language: English or with English translations
Original work only - no copyright infringement
No NSFW content, hate speech, extreme violence, or copyrighted material
